entities.name: whirlpool
entities.description: A long, black pole began to rise slowly out of the heart of the whirlpool.

entities.name: mast
entities.description: Harry saw the rigging and exclaimed, "It's a mast!"

entities.name: ship
entities.description: The ship rose out of the water, gleaming in the moonlight.

entities.name: portholes
entities.description: Dim, misty lights were shimmering at its portholes.
